title: Need to give my lease up!
posting_body: ** I will pay for the first month's rent after the paperwork is finalized **
I recently transferred to a different university/school and don't need this apartment lease anymore.
This is a 4-person apartment where everyone has their own private room and bathroom; this room is on the second floor.
There is also a free shuttle for students who don't have a car to drive to the SHSU campus.
There is free valet trash, a smart TV in the living room, free parking, a washer and dryer in your apartment, and free furniture.
There are many amenities for people such as a free 24-hour gym, green spaces, dog parks if you have pets, a circular pool, private study rooms, 24-hour package pickup, a game room, and tanning.
The rooms are furnished with a full-sized bed, drawers, a desk, and a chair.
Feel free to email me or DM me on Instagram @ ja._.ks .
